name: S.H.I.F.T. Cropped Tank
description:
This is a white cropped tank top with the Eklektik Ekhos logo. 

This is a One Size quality American Apparel top.

Proceeds from this shirt are going towards  funding the S.H.I.F.T. Project. 

The S.H.I.F.T. Project is dedicated to providing blenders to children in New Orleans. Through blending and giving them fun learning experiences, they will learn healthy nutritional options and the importance of increasing their fruit and vegetable intake.

The Tank

A great loose-fitting cropped tank, great paired with high-waist pants, skirts or shorts or as a beach cover up.

 
Poly-Cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) construction

Approximately 16 1/2" (41.9cm) in total length

Oversized - this style features a loose fit
